con:settings.con:setting: <xml-fragment xmlns:con="http://eviware.com/soapui/config"> <con:entry key="Global Properties" value=""/> <con:entry key="TestSuite" value="Services TestSuite"/> <con:entry key="Report to Generate" value=""/> <con:entry key="Password" value=""/> <con:entry key="soapui-setings.xml Password" value=""/> <con:entry key="TestRunner Path" value=""/> <con:entry key="Tool Args" value=""/> <con:entry key="Ignore Errors" value="false"/> <con:entry key="Host:Port" value=""/> <con:entry key="WSS Password Type" value=""/> <con:entry key="Save Project" value="false"/> <con:entry key="Enable UI" value="false"/> <con:entry key="System Properties" value=""/> <con:entry key="Domain" value=""/> <con:entry key="Coverage Report" value="false"/> <con:entry key="Export JUnit Results" value="false"/> <con:entry key="Open Report" value="false"/> <con:entry key="Project Properties" value=""/> <con:entry key="Project Password" value=""/> <con:entry key="Export All" value="false"/> <con:entry key="Report Format(s)" value=""/> <con:entry key="TestCase" value="<all>"/> <con:entry key="Print Report" value="false"/> <con:entry key="Username" value=""/> <con:entry key="Root Folder" value=""/> <con:entry key="Save After" value="false"/> <con:entry key="Add Settings" value="false"/> <con:entry key="Endpoint" value=""/> </xml-fragment>

con:method.name: get
con:method.con:description: Get list of applications available in the appstore

con:method.name: getRandomFact
con:method.con:description: Get a randomly chosen fact of a location

con:method.name: registerUserLocation
con:method.con:description: Registers a user to a location

con:method.name: getUsersAtLocation
con:method.con:description: Retreives users at a specific location

con:method.name: Get beer tap data
con:method.con:description: Get data from beer tap. Returns all data or number of tapped beers in the interval between to and from or for the entire time period.

con:method.name: getFriendLocation
con:method.con:description: Get the location of a friend

con:method.name: registerSample
con:method.con:description: Register a location sample containing signals and location name

con:method.name: getAllUserLocations
con:method.con:description: Get the location of all users

con:method.name: getCurrentLocation
con:method.con:description: Determine location based on WLAN signals received

con:method.name: getInfoAboutAllUkas
con:method.con:description: Sends startdate, enddate and name of all Ukas

con:testCase.name: ping TestCase
con:testCase.con:description: TestCase generated for REST Resource [echo] located at [/echo]

con:testCase.name: appstore/list TestCase
con:testCase.con:description: TestCase generated for REST Resource [list] located at [/appstore/list]

con:restRequest.name: Get list of applications
con:restRequest.con:description: Takes a list of signals as parameter. Contains bssid and signalStrength for all discovered end points.

con:testCase.name: location TestCase
con:testCase.con:description: TestCase generated for REST Resource [position] located at [/position]

con:testCase.name: location/sample TestCase
con:testCase.con:description: TestCase generated for REST Resource [sample] located at [/position/sample]

con:testCase.name: location/users TestCase
con:testCase.con:description: TestCase generated for REST Resource [users] located at [/position/users]

con:testStep.name: Get beer tap data in period
